Detailed Description

File plugin module Module that handles file access

Define Documentation

#define orxFILE_KU32_FLAG_OPEN_APPEND   0x00000004

descriptor positioned at the end of file

#define orxFILE_KU32_FLAG_OPEN_READ   0x00000001

opened for read

#define orxFILE_KU32_FLAG_OPEN_WRITE   0x00000002

opened for write

Closes an oppened file

Parameters:

Returns:

orxU32  _u32OpenFlags 
)

Opens a file for later read or write operation

Parameters:
[in] _zPath Full file's path to open
[in] _u32OpenFlags List of used flags when opened
Returns:
a File pointer (or orxNULL if an error has occured)

orxDLLAPI orxU32 orxFASTCALL orxFile_Read ( void *  _pReadData,
orxU32  _u32ElemSize,
orxU32  _u32NbElem,
orxFILE *  _pstFile 
)

Reads data from a file

Parameters:
[out] _pReadData Pointer where will be stored datas
[in] _u32ElemSize Size of 1 element
[in] _u32NbElem Number of elements
[in] _pstFile Pointer on the file descriptor
Returns:
Returns the number of read elements (not bytes)

orxDLLAPI orxBOOL orxFASTCALL orxFile_ReadLine ( orxSTRING  _zBuffer,
orxU32  _u32Size,
orxFILE *  _pstFile 
)

Gets text line from a file

Parameters:
[out] _zBuffer Pointer where will be stored datas
[in] _u32Size Size of buffer
[in] _pstFile Pointer on the file descriptor
Returns:
Returns orxTRUE if a line has been read, else returns orxFALSE.

orxFILE *  _pstFile

Parameters:
